name: Get That Hill
description:
Get That Hill is a reimagining of Nintendo's Donkey Kong. The premise remains the same, but instead of fighting a giant ape, you are tasked with taking down Jonah Hill. Seems simple enough, right? You (Keemstar) have to ascend the treacherous obstacles of Hill's domain, dodging toxic barrels as you try and reach Mr. Monopoly so that you can afford more G-Fuel.  

Controls-

  • W- Move Up, Jump, Climb Ladder Up
  • A- Move Left
  • S- Move Down, Climb Ladder Down
  • D- Move Right
  • Space- Pause (work in progress)

Credits

  • User SebastianDine for coding/design walkthrough.
  • Nintendo's Donkey Kong for template/base idea.
  • Jonah Hill, Mr. Monopoly, and Keemstar (David Keem) for existing so I could use their likeness as Characters.
  • Avenged Sevenfold for game music (8-bit version of Not Ready To Die).
